channel.title: Editing server-couplethings
channel.description:
BEFORE I BEGIN I WANNA SAY I LOVE CAPSS
[font=Verdana] OK IM A NEWB AT EDITING SERVERS, AND I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO ADD NPCS... REDUCE ITEM BONUSES.. THATS ABOUT IT...[/font][br][size=1]Posted on: October 26, 2007, 10:49:09 PM[/size][hr]im sure someone knows..

item.title: Editing server-couplethings
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I WOULD

FOR NPC’S GO TO NPC.CFG. FOR ITEM BONUSES GO TO ITEM.CFG AND FIND THE ID OF THE ITEM. IT’S THE (FIRST THREE NUMBERS) VALUES(ALCHS SHOPS ETC) AND THEN LIKE 12 BONUSES.

Read full topic
